name: Endangered Elephants!
description:
- Press Start and try to hide the elephant behind the bush. Every elephant hidden is a point. But beware the rifle crosshairs of poachers or the elephants may become extinct!

This game is a final project for my Anthropocene course and was designed to bring the science of environmental issues to the public in an artistic way.

Please enjoy the game and please protect our wildlife and our planet from mass extinction.
